content.question: Describe an urban model drawn from ONE of the following regions:• Latin America• Southeast Asia• Sub-Saharan Africa Describe where squatter settlements are located in the Latin American urban model compared with the Southeast Asian urban model.Explain ONE weakness of urban models in explaining patterns of settlement.Explain ONE reason why squatter settlements are common features of cities in the developing world.Describe ONE challenge to providing infrastructure faced by governments of large cities in the developing world.Describe ONE difference in the process settlers use to gain land tenure in squatter settlements compared with formal settlements.Explain how squatter settlements may change over time.

frqParts.text: Describe an urban model drawn from ONE of the following regions:• Latin America• Southeast Asia• Sub-Saharan Africa Describe where squatter settlements are located in the Latin American urban model compared with the Southeast Asian urban model.Explain ONE weakness of urban models in explaining patterns of settlement.Explain ONE reason why squatter settlements are common features of cities in the developing world.Describe ONE challenge to providing infrastructure faced by governments of large cities in the developing world.Describe ONE difference in the process settlers use to gain land tenure in squatter settlements compared with formal settlements.Explain how squatter settlements may change over time.

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
